metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42260 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: TinyXML through 2.6.2 has an infinite loop in TiXmlParsingData::Stamp intinyxmlparser.cpp via the TIXML_UTF_LEAD_0 case. It can be triggered by acrafted XML message and leads to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: tinyxml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
